title: Confessions of a Model (1938) Parisian spark meets Park Avenue | directed by Henry Koster

sources.title: Confessions of a Model (1938) Parisian spark meets Park Avenue | directed by Henry Koster
sources.description:
To address her financial difficulties, Nicole decides to seduce a wealthy suitor. She is assisted in her task by her friend Gloria and the maître d'hôtel of a prestigious New York establishment. Their choice falls on the millionaire Bill Duncan.

Original title: The Rage of Paris (1938) 

Directed by Henry Koster

Cast:
Danielle Darrieux - Nicole
Douglas Fairbanks Jr. - Jim Trevor
Mischa Auer - Mike
Louis Hayward - Bill Duncan
Helen Broderick - Gloria
Charles Coleman - Rigley
Samuel S. Hinds - Mr. Duncan
Nella Walker - Mrs. Duncan
Harry Davenport - Caretaker

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/4agFYuXtr2k
